description:
LIMITED TIME INTRODUCTORY SALE! Get MAGAZIN now for less than a dollar before it is too late!

GENERAL OVERVIEW
*************************************
MAGAZIN makes it easy for you to keep up with all your news sources.

Most websites (which publish news content) also broadcast their content in a format called an RSS Feed. MAGAZIN constantly reads these feeds and collects them all in one place, for easy access to the latest news from your favorite websites.

With MAGAZIN, you can track which stories you have read, star your favorite stories, and share exciting stories with your friends.

MAGAZIN also syncs your feeds with Google Reader, another feed reader that runs in your web browser. That way, all your news is always at your fingertips, whether you are with your HP TouchPad or at your computer. 

NOTABLE FEATURES
*************************************
- Offline Support: Read your news even when not connected to the internet. You also can mark items read and starred while offline -- Everything is synced with Google Reader when you get back online.

- Beautiful Interface: Google Reader has never looked better!

- Full Feed Editing: Add, remove, or edit your feeds directly from your TouchPad. No computer required!

- Expanded Sharing Options: Email a story to a friend or send to Instapaper right from the application!

- Three Viewing Choices: For each story, you can view the RSS summary, original website, or a special formatted view that removes distracting website fluff.

- Bulk Actions: Easily mark all items in a feed read/unread with the tap of a button!

UPCOMING FEATURES
*************************************
- Folder support
- More sharing options (Twitter, Facebook, Readitlater, etc.)
- Support for JustType, Exhibition and Tap2Share
versionNote:
- Added ability to only show feeds with unread items
- Improved performance when switching feeds and syncing stories
- New algorithm for determining what to show in Article view
- Menu choices are now remembered between app restarts
- Fixed localization bug that caused non-english users to be unable to login
